nodes.text: Zed was a pilot from the Bespin system who often competed in Holosimulator combat scenarios against veteran pilot Jayeena some time after the Battle of Endor. The pair also created their own combat simulator scenarios. Despite being a less experienced pilot than Jayeena, Zed believed he was a smarter one. One of their competitions resulted in the "Zed vs. Jayeena" holosimulator skirmish template.
